attributes.action: Make the Government declassify all its knowlege on paranormal sightings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Govenment holds classified info about aliens and UFO's that have been spotted in the U.K. If you research it enough on the internet you will find out that the military have had various sightings of diffrent entities but you will never know what they are because the information is classified straight away. The govenment know more than they are letting on about aleins.
